016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.generator;
017
018import static de.cuioss.tools.collect.CollectionLiterals.immutableList;
019
020import java.math.BigDecimal;
021import java.math.BigInteger;
022import java.util.Date;
023import java.util.List;
024
025import javax.faces.convert.BigDecimalConverter;
026import javax.faces.convert.BigIntegerConverter;
027import javax.faces.convert.BooleanConverter;
028import javax.faces.convert.ByteConverter;
029import javax.faces.convert.CharacterConverter;
030import javax.faces.convert.Converter;
031import javax.faces.convert.DateTimeConverter;
032import javax.faces.convert.DoubleConverter;
033import javax.faces.convert.EnumConverter;
034import javax.faces.convert.FloatConverter;
035import javax.faces.convert.IntegerConverter;
036import javax.faces.convert.LongConverter;
037import javax.faces.convert.NumberConverter;
038import javax.faces.convert.ShortConverter;
039
040import de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators;
041import de.cuioss.test.generator.TypedGenerator;
042import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.ComponentConfigurator;
043
044/**
045 * Hybrid class that acts as an {@link TypedGenerator} and
046 * {@link ComponentConfigurator}.
047 *
048 * @author Oliver Wolff
049 */
050@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
051public class JsfProvidedConverter implements TypedGenerator<Class> {
052
053    /** Defines all converter types provided by JSF. */
054    @SuppressWarnings("java:S2386") // owolff: false positive -> immutableList
055    public static final List<ConverterDescriptor> JSF_CONVERTER = immutableList(
056            new ConverterDescriptor(BigDecimalConverter.class, BigDecimal.class, BigDecimalConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
057            new ConverterDescriptor(BigIntegerConverter.class, BigInteger.class, BigIntegerConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
058            new ConverterDescriptor(BooleanConverter.class, Boolean.class, BooleanConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
059            new ConverterDescriptor(ByteConverter.class, Byte.class, ByteConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
060            new ConverterDescriptor(CharacterConverter.class, Character.class, CharacterConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
061            new ConverterDescriptor(DateTimeConverter.class, Date.class, DateTimeConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
062            new ConverterDescriptor(DoubleConverter.class, Double.class, DoubleConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
063            new ConverterDescriptor(EnumConverter.class, Enum.class, EnumConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
064            new ConverterDescriptor(FloatConverter.class, Float.class, FloatConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
065            new ConverterDescriptor(IntegerConverter.class, Integer.class, IntegerConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
066            new ConverterDescriptor(LongConverter.class, Long.class, LongConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
067            new ConverterDescriptor(NumberConverter.class, Number.class, NumberConverter.CONVERTER_ID),
068            new ConverterDescriptor(ShortConverter.class, Short.class, ShortConverter.CONVERTER_ID));
069
070    /** Defines a generator for all converter types provided by JSF. */
071    public static final TypedGenerator<ConverterDescriptor> CONVERTER_CLASS_GERNERATOR = Generators
072            .fixedValues(JSF_CONVERTER);
073
074    /** A generator for every id of registered generator. */
075    public static final TypedGenerator<String> CONVERTER_ID_GENERATOR = Generators
076            .fixedValues(JSF_CONVERTER.stream().map(ConverterDescriptor::getConverterId).toList());
077
078    /** A generator for a subset of types a generator is registered as default. */
079    public static final TypedGenerator<Class<?>> TARGET_TYPE_GENERATOR = Generators
080            .fixedValues(immutableList(Integer.class, Double.class, Float.class, Boolean.class, BigInteger.class));
081
082    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
083    @Override
084    public Class<Converter> next() {
085        return (Class<Converter>) CONVERTER_CLASS_GERNERATOR.next().getConverterClass();
086    }
087
088    @Override
089    public Class<Class> getType() {
090        return Class.class;
091    }
092
093}
